verses.content: Lal David chun Israel lal po pohai, hnam tina luhai, a pâwl pâwla lal sinthawtuhai hotuhai, sipai sâng khat pâwl chunga hotuhai, za khat pâwl chunga hotuhai, a naupa- salhai le lal thilnei le thuomhnaw po po chunga rorêltuhai le, mi lienhai le, mi huoisen, mi hrât khawkhênghai po po chu Jerusalema chun a ko khâwm vawng a.

Chun, lal David chu a kein a ngîr a, “Ka unauhai, ka mihai, lo ngai ta u; keia ngaia chun LALPA thuthlungna bâwm châwlna ding in le, Pathien ke innghatna ding hmun bâwlpêk chu ka lungrilah a um a; chuongchun, a in bâwlna ding khawm chu ka siem zo hieu tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chun, ‘Nang chun ka in bâwl naw ti nih, indo mi i na, thisen însuo hlak leiin,’ a ta.

Ngai ta u, LALPA Israel Pathien chun kumkhuoa Israelhai chunga lala um dingin ka thlatuhai thla laia inthawk chun a mi thlang suok a; ka thlatu sûngkuoah, Juda sûngkuoa chun, Juda chu hotu ni dingin a thlang ta sih a; chuongchun, ka pa naupasalhai laia chun Israel po po chunga lala mi siem chu ṭha a ti zâwng tak a ni tah a;
chun, ka naupasalhai po laiah (LALPA chun naupasal tamtak a mi pêk sih a), Israel chunga LALPA rama lalṭhungphaa ṭhung dingin ka naupa Solomon chu a thlang tah a.
Chun, ka kuomah a hril a, ‘I naupa Solomon hin ka in le ka tuollai sûng chu bâwl a tih, ama chu ka naupa ni dingin ka thlang tah a, kei khawm a pa nîng ka tih.
Chun, a ram khawm chu kum- khawtluongin sukdet ka tih, tulai hun anga ka rorêlhai le ka thupêkhai thaw dinga a pawm zing chun,’ tiin.

“Chuleiin, tuhin, LALPA mipui inkhâwm Israelhai mithmua le ei Pathien hrietna hin, hi ram ṭhatak hi in nei thei a, kumkhuoa dinga in thlahai kuoma rochan ni dinga in mâksanpêk theina dingin LALPA in Pathien thupêkhai po po chu zawng suok unla, zâwm ro.

Chun, nang ka naupa Solomon, i thlatuhai Pathien chu hre la, lungril inhâwktak le lungril tlûntakin ama rawng chu bâwl rawh; LALPA chun lungril sûng po po chu a zawng suok hlak a, lungrila tumhai khawm chu a hriet hlak sih a; ama chu i zawng chun, i hmuah um ngei a ta; amiruok- chu, ama chu i nghatsan chun, ama khawmin kumkhuoa dingin pei thla vêng a ti che.
Tuhin fîmkhur la; hmun in- thieng ta dinga in bâwl dingin LALPA chun a ruot ta si cheh a; insukhrât la thaw nghâl rawh,” tiin.

Chun, David chun a naupa Solomon kuoma chun biek in tuolpûk lim le chutaka a in le, a sum sie- khâwmna in le, chutaka a pindan chunghnunghai le, a pindan sûngril- hai le, zângaina ṭhungpha hmun dinghai lim chu a pêk a;
a lungrila a lo hmu ta ang chun: LALPA in tuolsûng tuollai inhuonna dâm, a vêl pindan po po lim dâm, Pathien ina sum siekhâwmna in lim dâm, thilser siekhâwmna in lim dâm chu a pêk a;
thiempuhai le Levi mihai a pâwl pâwla an umna ding hmun lim dâm, Lalpa ina dinga bûr le bêl po po hai lim dâm,
rawngbâwlna ding bûr le bêl chi tin, rângkachak bûr le bêl ding, rângkachak hmang zât ding,

rângkachak khâwnvar siena le a khâwnvar ding rângkachak hmang zât ding le, a sathâu khâwnvar siena le chutaka a khâwnvar ta ding chun rângkachak a bûka bûkin a pêk a; tangkaruo khawm tangkaraw sathâu khâwnvar siena dingin le a khâwnvar siena tin bûkzie ang pei chun a pêk a;
chun, entirna bei siena dinga dawkân dingin rângkachak, dawkân tin ta dingin; chun, tangkaraw daw- kân ta dingin tangkaruo;
sa kuoikimhai le, châwtawlhai le nohai chu, rângkachak inthieng: rângkachak maihûn ding chun mai- hûn tin chu a bûk ang peiin, tang- karaw maihûn ding chun maihûn tin a bûk ang peiin;
chun, riminhnik râwna mâi- châma ding chun rângkachak suk- thieng a bûka bûkin, chun, cherubhai LALPA thuthlungna bâwm an thlahai zâra inkhumtuhai tawlailîr lima dinga chun rângkachak a pêk bawk a.
David chun, “Hieng po po hi LALPA chun keima chungah ama kut ngeia ziekin a mîn hriettir a nih, hi riruongna sin po pohai hi,” a tih a.

Chun, David chun a naupa Solomon kuoma chun, “Insukhrât la, insukhuoi la, thaw el rawh; ṭi naw la, beidawng bawk naw rawh; LALPA Pathien, ka Pathien ngei chu i kuomah a um sih a; LALPA ina rawngbâwlna sin po pohai chu zo a ni vawng hmakhat chun inhlawsamtir naw ni cheh a, nghatsan bawk naw ni che.

Chun, ngai ta, Pathien ina rawngbâwlna po poa dingin Levi mihai le thiempuhai chu pâwl an um a; sin kawng chi tinrênga ding chun mi themthiem inhâwktak takhai i kuomah um an ta, rawngbâwlna kawng tinrênga ding chun; mipuihai hotuhai po po khawm chu i thu thuin an um ding a nih,” a ta.
